roleset.name: establish again
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to institute.01.

example.text: Under attack by its own listed companies and powerful floor traders , the [New York Stock Exchange]-1 is considering PRO-1 reinstituting a `` collar '' on program trading that it abandoned last year , according to people familiar with the Big Board .
example.arg: a `` collar '' on program trading that it abandoned last year
